diff_act: 6.log 'Message Digest' values in a tamper-evident manner

regen.new_specification: The system shall trigger an alert and notify the administrator when a mismatch between the computed 'Message Digest' values and the development records is detected.

regen.new_specification: The system shall alert the operator or take corrective action when a mismatch is found between the computed 'Message Digest' values and the development records.

regen.new_specification: The system shall alert the operator and take corrective action when a mismatch is detected between the computed 'Message Digest' values and the development records.

label: A verification failure shall will cause an alarm condition for the affected control unit.
